sections.title: Sidewalk Safety
sections.content: Watch out for salt in winter and hot pavement in summer. Booties are a must.

sections.title: Subway Rules
sections.content: Dogs must be in a bag to ride the subway. Plan accordingly!

living_with_dogs_here.summary: NYC is a dog lover's paradise, but you need a dog that can handle noise, elevators, and small spaces.
living_with_dogs_here.dog_friendly_score_explained: Based on parks, vets, and services.
